name: Cyber Fight
description: Cyber Fight is an old-school pixel platformer with nice electronic music, made in the style of urban steampunk. In order to get to the next level you need to destroy all enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 237 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or higer Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 237 MB available space
